"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { motion } from "framer-motion" import { FaBus, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaRegClock, FaExclamationTriangle, FaCity, FaMoon, FaSun, FaChartBar, FaUsers, FaMobileAlt, } from "react-icons/fa" import { AiOutlineBarChart } from "react-icons/ai" import { MdOutlineTimer } from "react-icons/md" import { BsGraphUp } from "react-icons/bs" import "./LandingPage.css" const LandingPage = () => { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(true) const [scrollY, setScrollY] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrollY(window.scrollY) window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) document.documentElement.classList.add("dark") return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) }, []) const toggleTheme = () => { setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode) document.documentElement.classList.toggle("dark") } const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { document.getElementById(sectionId)?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }) } const features = [ { icon: , title: "Live Tracking", description: "Real-time bus position, speed, and ETA displayed on an interactive map.", }, { icon: , title: "Smart Timetable", description: "View daily and weekly schedules with delays and disruptions highlighted.", }, { icon: , title: "Emergency Alerts", description: "Instant notifications for breakdowns, route changes, or emergency situations.", }, { icon: , title: "Change City", description: "Seamlessly switch between different cities and routes with ease.", }, { icon: , title: "Theme Toggle", description: "Personalize your experience with dark and light theme options.", action: toggleTheme, }, { icon: , title: "Analytics Dashboard", description: "Comprehensive graphs for time vs distance, speed, stops, and passenger load.", }, ] const benefits = [ { icon: , title: "Save Travel Time", description: "Get accurate ETAs and plan your journey with confidence. No more waiting at bus stops wondering when your bus will arrive.", }, { icon: , title: "Improve City Transport", description: "Help operators optimize routes and schedules with data-driven insights, making public transport more efficient for everyone.", }, { icon: , title: "Enhanced Commuter Experience", description: "Enjoy a stress-free commute with real-time updates, emergency alerts, and personalized journey planning.", }, ] return (

Real-time bus monitoring and tracking system with simulation and analytics. Track buses live, get predictive insights, and make your commute more efficient.

Revolutionizing Public Transport

Bus-Karo's mission is to reduce delays, make public transport predictable, and improve efficiency for both passengers and operators. We combine real-time tracking with advanced analytics to create a smarter transportation ecosystem.

Powerful Features for Smart Transit

Everything you need to track, analyze, and optimize your bus journey experience.
